name: Colorflop (beta)
description:
Controls

Z = become red

X = become green

C = become blue

right arrow = go to the right lane

left arrow = go to the left lane

your goal is to become the same color and go in the same lane as the falling boxes to stop them from hitting the ground. Make sure to change to the right color before the boxes hit you. You are the box on the bottom that isn't falling. 

This is my first project and I still need to fix the graphics a bit. I used Godot for this game.
